column1: #text=In the morning , I woke up to prepare for the day .
#text=After getting coffee ready , I took on breakfast .
#text=My partner awoke , and she began to get ready in the bathroom .
#text=She was out by the time food was ready .
#text=We spoke about our plans for the day , and what we intended our goals to be .
#text=After getting dressed up to head outside , we headed over to the gardening store to choose a tree for our yard .
#text=Both of us were hoping for a nice Japanese Maple tree .
#text=The checkout lady was nice , we found exactly what we were looking for after we got into the store .
#text=Driving home , we could barely contain our excitement .
#text=After stepping back in the house for a quick snack and another cup of coffee , we set out to the shed to get the right tools .
#text=The hole was easy to dig , and the tree was transplanted successfully .
